document_data.name: Daeros's Full Plate
document_data.mainbody: '''''Daeros's full plate''''' was a [[dwarven]]-crafted suit of [[full plate]] armor worn by [[Daeros Dragonspear]], builder of [[Dragonspear Castle]].
document_data.Description:
While it was crafted from heavy [[steel]] the breastplate was notable light. The front of the armor bore a detailed relief of flying [[copper dragon]], presumably Daeros's companion [[Halatathlaer]].

It was believed to have been made by the dwarves of [[Kanaglym]].{{Cite web/Siege of Dragonspear: Field Report}}
document_data.Powers: The suit of  ''+1 full plate mail'' protected the wearer from fire and the devastating breath of [[dragon]]s.
